snippet.title: THE ABC'S OFFICIAL GUIDE TO ORAL SEX
snippet.content: We must pay the ABC $1 billion a year. : Are you terrified of sucking d*ck? If you don't have one yourself, it can be quite confronting. Even if you're a guy and it's your first time getting one in your mouth, it can be daunting. It's not as if you've been able to suck your own!? It's as if where teaching and training a generation of people for whom sexual self-gratification is all there is to this meaningless life. But why must the rest of us subsidise this?

sindex.name: ABC'S OFFICIAL GUIDE TO ORAL SEX
